alert.note: Alert for Crittenden (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 9:18AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Mississippi, northeastern Crittenden, western Tipton, southwestern Lauderdale and northern Shelby Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 917 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gilmore to near Jericho to West Memphis. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, West Memphis, Marion, Millington, Wilson, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Munford, Joiner, Edmondson, Sunset, Gilmore, Bassett, Jericho, Ellendale, Frayser, Fulton, Dixonville, Tipton and Crittenden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
